itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Stanley "Stan" G. Owen (7 March 1932 – 12 September 2019) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Pontypridd RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain, Wales, Other Nationalities and English League XIII, and at club level for Leigh (Heritage № 617), St. Helens (Heritage № 816), Rochdale Hornets and Blackpool Borough, as a prop.
